header.title: How NeuroAid Works
header.subtitle: From Input to Insights
header.description: Our streamlined, scientifically-validated process takes you from initial assessment to comprehensive cognitive risk score in just 10-15 minutes.

steps.title: Registration & Setup
steps.shortDesc: Quick account creation and personalized profile setup

details.overview: Begin your cognitive health journey with a simple, secure registration process. We collect only essential information to personalize your assessment experience.

substeps.title: Create Account
substeps.description: Sign up with email or social login. All data is encrypted and HIPAA-compliant.

substeps.title: Privacy Consent
substeps.description: Review and accept our privacy policy. Your data is never shared without explicit consent.

substeps.title: Basic Profile
substeps.description: Provide age, language preference, and optional demographic information for personalized analysis.

technicalDetails: End-to-end encryption for all user data
HIPAA and GDPR compliant data handling
Secure OAuth 2.0 authentication
Anonymous data processing options available

steps.title: Speech Analysis Tasks
steps.shortDesc: Guided speaking exercises to capture vocal and linguistic patterns

details.overview: Complete a series of carefully designed speech tasks that capture subtle cognitive markers through your voice, speech patterns, and language use.

substeps.title: Audio Setup
substeps.description: Quick microphone test to ensure clear audio capture. Works with any device microphone.

substeps.title: Picture Description
substeps.description: Describe a series of images in detail. Captures vocabulary richness and narrative coherence.

substeps.title: Fluency Tasks
substeps.description: Speak continuously on given topics. Analyzes speech rate, pauses, and word retrieval patterns.

substeps.title: Memory Recall
substeps.description: Listen to a short story and retell it. Evaluates working memory and comprehension.

technicalDetails: Analyzes 50+ acoustic features (pitch, rhythm, pauses)
Natural Language Processing for semantic analysis
Detects hesitations, word-finding difficulties, and repetitions
Compares patterns against age-matched normative data

steps.title: Text & Writing Tasks
steps.shortDesc: Written exercises to evaluate language complexity and coherence

details.overview: Engage in brief writing tasks that reveal cognitive patterns through text structure, vocabulary choice, and linguistic complexity.

substeps.title: Sentence Completion
substeps.description: Complete partial sentences. Assesses language processing and contextual understanding.

substeps.title: Short Essay
substeps.description: Write a brief paragraph on a familiar topic. Evaluates coherence and organization.

substeps.title: Word Association
substeps.description: Type words related to given prompts. Measures semantic memory and processing speed.

technicalDetails: Analyzes vocabulary diversity and complexity
Evaluates grammatical structure and syntax
Measures semantic coherence and topic maintenance
Detects spelling errors and typing patterns

steps.title: AI-Powered Analysis
steps.shortDesc: Advanced machine learning algorithms process your data

details.overview: Our proprietary AI models analyze your speech and text data using state-of-the-art machine learning techniques trained on extensive cognitive health datasets.

substeps.title: Feature Extraction
substeps.description: Extract 200+ linguistic, acoustic, and cognitive markers from your responses.

substeps.title: Neural Network Processing
substeps.description: Deep learning models identify subtle patterns associated with cognitive changes.

substeps.title: Risk Calculation
substeps.description: Compare your patterns against validated normative databases for age and demographics.

substeps.title: Confidence Scoring
substeps.description: Generate confidence intervals and reliability metrics for transparent results.

technicalDetails: Transformer-based language models (BERT, GPT architecture)
Ensemble of multiple specialized AI models
Trained on 50,000+ validated cognitive assessments
Continuous learning from anonymized user data
Cross-validated accuracy: 87% sensitivity, 92% specificity

steps.title: Results & Recommendations
steps.shortDesc: Comprehensive cognitive risk score with personalized insights

details.overview: Receive a detailed, easy-to-understand report with your cognitive risk score, key findings, and personalized recommendations for next steps.

substeps.title: Risk Score
substeps.description: Clear numerical score (0-100) indicating cognitive health status with visual indicators.

substeps.title: Domain Breakdown
substeps.description: Detailed scores across memory, language, attention, and executive function domains.

substeps.title: Key Findings
substeps.description: Highlighted areas of strength and potential concern with plain-language explanations.

substeps.title: Next Steps
substeps.description: Personalized recommendations: lifestyle changes, follow-up timing, or clinical referral.

substeps.title: Downloadable Report
substeps.description: PDF report you can share with healthcare providers or keep for your records.

technicalDetails: Results compared to age-matched normative data
Confidence intervals provided for all scores
Longitudinal tracking for repeat assessments
Secure portal for accessing historical results
Optional: Direct sharing with healthcare providers

summary.description: Complete your comprehensive cognitive screening in less time than it takes to make a cup of coffee. Results are available immediately upon completion.

scientific.title: Scientifically Validated
scientific.description: Our assessment methodology is based on peer-reviewed research in cognitive neuroscience and has been validated against traditional cognitive screening tools like MMSE and MoCA.

privacy.title: Privacy & Security
privacy.description: Your data security and privacy are our top priorities. We employ industry-leading security measures and comply with all healthcare data regulations.
